data.title: Logistics Automation for Your Value Chain
data.meta_description: Automation technology, software and services covering everything from production and distribution to POS and the last mile. Discover innovation by KNAPP!
data.text:
Automate Your Logistics Operations

Using Our Intelligent and Digital Solutions

Powerful robotics meets intelligent software. With our range of intelligent automation solutions including shuttles, bots, pocket sorters, AMRs, WMS, WCS, analytics tools and more, we’ve got every step of your value chain covered – from production and distribution to the point of sale – with highest efficiency and while saving resources.

Equip yourself with cutting-edge technologies, from robotics to AI, to ensure efficiency throughout your value chain!

Your customers will love you for it.

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Smart logistics automation

starts with your industry

We live and breathe logistics and see ourselves as a partner to industry. We don’t deliver off-the-shelf solutions – instead, we work with you to create an individual automation solution that is attuned to your logistical requirements and growth targets. Our core areas are healthcare, textiles and fashion, trade, e-commerce and omnichannel retail, food retail and production.

Automating and digitalizing logistics operations since 1952

What drives us is our passion for developing new solutions for the ever-evolving demands in production and logistics. This passion goes back to the founder of our company, Günter Knapp, who was a passionate and visionary inventor. Naturally, innovation is part of our company DNA. And as we innovate, we follow our motto making complexity simple to provide easy, efficient, safe and economical technologies and automation solutions for the entire value chain.

Value chain vs. supply chain – what’s the difference?

Find out why thinking in terms of value chains makes more sense for your success.

Renowned companies bank on our intelligent automation solutions

Many companies from all over the world place their trust in our expertise. Our intelligent automation solutions are operating worldwide, optimizing the logistical processes of our customers. Solutions for automating your logistics operations cover:

Analysis and consulting

Sales and design engineering

Project management

Production

Installation and startup

Customer service and support

Always just around the corner thanks to our KNAPP network

Being located near our customers is incredibly important to us. Our headquarters are located in Hart bei Graz, Austria. Our network of 62 locations with around 7,000 employees stretches across the globe, ensuring that you always have a logistics automation expert nearby, for example, when you suddenly need a spare part.

Increase your value to customers with intelligent logistics automation solutions. Let’s have a chat about the potential of your value chain.
